SEARCH
Package ru.introguzzle.parsers.common.mapping.deserialization

Interface TypeAdapter<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the target field type for conversion
All Superinterfaces:
BiFunction<Object,Type,T>
public interface TypeAdapter<T> extends BiFunction<Object,Type,T>
Functional interface for handling custom type conversions.

TypeAdapter allows customization of how specific types are mapped from JSON objects to Java objects. Implementations of this interface are applied during the conversion process, where each TypeAdapter instance is associated with a target field type T.

This interface extends Function with a more specific purpose, handling type-specific conversions as part of the JSON deserialization process. A TypeAdapter takes an Object as input and converts it to an instance of field type T.
